Name: Detective Riddles - Sherlock's Heritage
About the game: A conspiracy is brewing against the peaceful citizens! Only a private detective capable of taking on any case can help! Outsmart the villain and strike first! Solve the Evil Genius's clever puzzles and surpass even the great Sherlock himself in your deductions! The path to catching the villain will take you through 120 unique Griddlers, and only a true detective will remain steadfast and solve all the puzzles. 120 unique riddles and 6 locations. More than 9 hours of gameplay. New and improved controls. Choose a training level based on your skills and complete only the tutorial you really need. With its mysterious atmosphere of criminal secrets, this is a game for those who want to dive into an exciting detective world! 6 mysterious cases â€“ 6 exciting adventures! Solve all the riddles and uncover all the clever villain's mystical crimes! Prove that no one can defeat you and earn the recognition of Sherlock himself! -A Griddlers game -Make any purchase - turn off ads! -120 unique levels and 6 locations -More than 9 hours of gameplay with detective music -Gameplay built on logic alone with no need for guessing -New and improved tutorial. Choose a training level based on your skills and complete only the tutorial you really need -Special tasks and more than 15 fun trophies -Mystical atmosphere of detective world!
